overview:
Daniel is the founder and CEO of TipMeet. He has over 15 years of telecommunication and IT experience.

At the age of 18 he was already a project manager with Novosibirsk Chamber of Commerce, he moved to telecom business in the ’90s, first with Siberian Business Cooperation Network, then with KSN ISP as Managing Director.

Daniel founded Avantel ISP in 2001 which was acquired by Severen Group in 2007.

He holds a Dipl.-Ing. in electrical engineering and computer science from the State Technical University of Novosibirsk.

Specialties Innovation expert, social media, social network, interactive media, digital content, telecommunications, project management, scrum, agile
